scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && npm run db:setup
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
